title: pAlayamAm AnjanEya
sahitya:
pAlayamAm AnjanEya bhakta bhAgadEya AnjanEya
			(madhyamakAla)
bhAvita raghava jAnaki pUjya pAvana tAraka nAma sannAda


anupallavi

 mukti sukha nAdalOlamati dhIra mOhana rAmapada sArasa vihAra
			(madhyamakAla)
mudita sada hrdaya sadaya kaya jita sakala maya sukrta anapAya


caraNam    naigama sArAmrta vacana nata shubhakara bhUsura hrdi ramaNa
ayi karuNArasa pUrita nayana alalita durjana bhIkarAnana
			(madhyamaklAla)
ati dhrtakara vara putra sucaritra amala pavitra raghurAma mitra
			(alternate version)
rajita gagana vara shuddha sucarita amala pavitrada raghurAma mitra
